# Lie down & relax with PILLOW, the only MR app designed for your bed!

**Featuring 4 Mixed-Reality dreams**, PILLOW is an award-winning collection of 4 beautiful & innovative lying down apps, playable in both single player or 2-player multiplayer.  

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75334067_8801252673240189_4151211257195892396_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=40TuYACfa_oQ7kNvgG5zmiu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAdJMxNRObI2S0Vo9URrxxt2Oxtyd-0AbCyYkNzCjbdkQ&oe=66FA7DF3)


# 1. FISH FROM YOUR CEILING & uncover messages left by other players üé£  

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982524_546750671060484_5242610136396799232_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Qd6iK1YvCvkQ7kNvgEg3V2j&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgs2pjT1L08b5ks6_95ABnMbKDCa3gDFbVNi89kIO6xg&oe=66FA8161)
In this gravity-twist to fishing, every fish is a voice message left by another user, and every day your pond will ask you a unique question (like "What did you want to be growing up?"). Catch fish to listen to the heartfelt answeres of others - and grab a fish egg and speak into it to leave a fish behind for others to find.

‚Äé
  
# 2. EXPLORE THE STARS & transform your ceiling into a planetarium üå† 

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974611_4015426588678768_9124240534523236338_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TgSuoQ5g8KwQ7kNvgF82cm0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAlP-Qq0DKxrXe3tutl0CQmheymt_1gH4KUHa2qLPdNow&oe=66FA88C5)

STARGAZE from your bed as your ceiling transforms into an interactive night sky unlike any other. Grab 88 unique constellations from the sky using nothing but your hands to listen to their stories - and travel across the Universe to see them up close in a unique, musical rocket mini-game.

‚Äé

# 3. BREATHE & RELAX as you create worlds with your breath üå¨Ô∏è

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036624_2419779881696160_4957043057185365935_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HYN9_ujm0PMQ7kNvgHr3O_6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAD6cz3ll1DCgJtGYCN8bkucVE3FC9amcV7g0MZdgBfjw&oe=66FA70F5)

In this breathe-tracked experience, watch as your breath turns into magical streams that open portals to distant, relaxing worlds.  Whether you are looking to wind down or to fall deep into sleep, enjoy 12 unique variations as you relax at the end of a hard day.


‚Äé
# 4. PLAY INTERACTIVE BEDTIME STORIES & rediscover who you are üìñ 

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974788_1455810491797502_9214146969621434663_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FtJF_5XqqIgQ7kNvgG-zYcc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB5mEpQPbXPYJLShSRiDbI8NK9rpWAiwfPK_2e8kIYj-A&oe=66FA6EE2)

Whether you are alone or with a friend, immerse yourself in 8 unique stories where you get to make choices that truly mattes! Featuring hundreds of unique endings, these simple but heartwarming tales will immerse you in distant, relaxing worlds - all while helping you learn about what your choices say about you.


‚Äé

# 5. **SHARE YOUR BED** & feel closer to the ones you care about.

The most unique Mixed Reality social experience ever created, PILLOW's multiplayer mode literally connects you to the bed of someone else - and then lets you share it as you play all of our dreams!

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75334067_8801252673240189_4151211257195892396_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=40TuYACfa_oQ7kNvgG5zmiu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAdJMxNRObI2S0Vo9URrxxt2Oxtyd-0AbCyYkNzCjbdkQ&oe=66FA7DF3)




# And this is just the beginning...

PILLOW is an experimental app that is constantly being updated with free updates, so get ready to see it evolve! And if you want to be part of it, join our community @ https://Pillow.Social/


‚Äé

# So whether you are just relaxing by yourself...
# or using PILLOW to feel closer to who you care about...
# We wish you the sweetest of dreams! ‚ú® 


‚Äé

üêü  **Sky Fishing** has a new and improved fishing rod that should feel much better to control and now you can make multiple recordings in each pond! We also refined the UI, VFX, SFX, improved the volumes of all of our recordings and added a new interactive tutorial for first timers, alongside other UX improvements (like, the fishing rod is to the side now. so much better).

üìî **Storybook** has an all new LINEAR mode as well as new interactive stories! These feature a unique, relaxing tone (and even a little bit of romance!), so we'd love to know your thoughts. Bonus points for whoever can find the story where Zucc has a romance with Elon Musk :Elon: :Zuckini: 

üå† **Stargazing** has been improved with better ceiling animations, hyperspace effects when you visit/exit constellations and lots of other visual & UX improvements that improve the feel and handling of the whole thing! It also has an interactive tutorial too!

ü´Å **Breathe** has been improved with new breathe-guidance SFX and beautiful mixed-reality subtitles for all of our meditations. 

Also easier Setup has also been added to the experience, which should make getting started in the beginning a lot easier for some people. We also fixed bugs. Lots of bugs. The app should be much more stable and polished overall if you are showing off Pillow to family and friends this holiday season üôÇ

This is just the first of many free updates and I'm really happy to be sharing this journey with you guys. So hope you all have a great time with family & friends this holiday season, and we can't wait to hear your thoughts on our changes at http://Pillow.Social/ üôÇ

Have a relaxing rest of your day!

Lucas
